comments:
In the flex hierarhcy, the "Lookup Source" action is tied to the launch view, 
which no longer performs source lookup. It results in an NPE:

java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.launch.LaunchView.selectionChanged
(LaunchView.java:526)
    at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.launch.LaunchView.redoSourceLookup
(LaunchView.java:548)

(LookupSourceAction.java:64)

As well, the EditSourceLookupPathAction needs a way to trigger source lookup, and clear the previous source lookup result.

Fixed. In the new "flex" world, there is a SourceLookupManager that has a source lookup service per workbench window. The source lookup manager is also a "ISourceDisplayAdapter" so it can be used to perform a source lookup for an object. The "LookupSourceAction" and "EditSourceLookupPathAction" now use this method to lookup source. As well, the "CommonSourceNotFoundEditor" uses this API to re-lookup source after the source lookup path has changed.

The "CommonSourceNotFoundEditor" used to respond to change events to re-lookup source. This function was removed. Instead, the SourceLookupManager should be used to lookup source when required.
